The difference between FMA and Brotherhood is that FMA is both an anime and a manga. FMA (anime) differed from the manga in many ways. For example, the manga is still being written. It's not finished yet. The FMA anime has an end to the whole series. They remade the anime to more closely go along with the manga with the original anime. Hope that helped!

FMAB also features higher quality animation than FMA. FMAB follows the FMA(manga) storyline much more faithfully than FMA, which some would claim makes for a better series. however, imho both series have their merits.

@dark_link343:
